INNETTO(A,NN) ;INNETTO;DT;ERRECHNEN NETTO EK AUS BASISPREIS;27.03.2000 ; Compiled March 1, 2005 11:41:03 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ERRECHNEN NETTO EK AUS BASISPREIS ; Take the base value in D12 and return the discounted/surcharged/rebated value ; ; Called By : ; INANG, INARTK, INARTKWHR, INAUF, INAUFANLAGE, INAUFDISC, INAUFPA, INAUFPAM44, ; INAUFPK, INAUFPKNEU, INAUFPOS, INAUFWH, INBMECSV1, INDRUCK6, INDRUCKXML6, ; INDRUCKXML6PRINT, INERECH1, INERECH1M44, INERECH1P1, INERECHFAST, INKALKEK, ; INNETTOBRUTTO, INPRIM, INSALESPRICE ; ; Inputs : ; A (pobjSource) Source record : objINAUFP, objINAUFPA, objINAUFPK, objINERECH1, +? ; FIXME : if A is objINARTK then NK is obtained from D25 - what happens if A is some other class? <GRF> ; A=~RAB1~RAB2~RAB3~RAB4~ZUSCHL/ABSCHL~BETRAG~%SKONTO~~~~BASISPREIS~NETTOPREIS~~~~~~~~~~~~Nachkommastellen ; NN Procesing switch ; NN=0 NETTO/NETTO ; NN=1 OHNE BERECHNUNG VON SKONTO ;without ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; NETTO ; ; ; History : ; 28-Sep-2006 GRF Doco ; 04-Sep-2006 GRF Doco ; 27.03.2000 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new NETTO,YI,NK
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ May vary in description between classes ; 2 : Discount 1 ; 3 : Discount 2 ; 4 : Discount 3 ; 5 : Surcharge/Discount % ; 6 : Surcharge/Discount Amount ; 7 : DealerÂ´s Rebate % ; 12 : Base Price ; 25 : Number of Decimal Places ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
set NETTO = 0 quit:'$data(A) NETTO quit:+$piece(A,Y,12)=0 NETTO ;KEIN BASISPREIS ;no
set NETTO = $piece(A,Y,12) ;NETTO=BRUTTO if $length($piece(NETTO,".",1))>9 set NETTO = 0 ; see FIXME below for YI=2,3,4 if +$piece(A,Y,YI)'=0 set:$piece(A,Y,YI)>100 $piece(A,Y,YI) = 100 set NETTO = NETTO-(NETTO/100*$piece(A,Y,YI)) ;RABATTE for YI=5 if +$piece(A,Y,YI)'=0 set:$piece(A,Y,YI)<-100 $piece(A,Y,YI) = -100 set NETTO = NETTO+(NETTO/100*$piece(A,Y,YI)) ;ZU/ABSCHLAG set NETTO=NETTO+$piece(A,Y,6) ;ZUSCHLAG/ABSCHLAGSBETRAG if +$get(NN)=0 for YI=7 if +$piece(A,Y,YI)'=0 set NETTO = NETTO-(NETTO/100*$piece(A,Y,YI)) ;SKONTO NUR WENN MIT SKONTO ;only when by means of
; Number of decimal places set NK = $piece(A,Y,25) ; $$$INARTKDecimalPlaces / $$$INAUFPKNumericDecimalPlace if NK="" set NK = 2 if NK>4 set NK = 2 if NK<2 set NK = 2 ; FIXME : forms are INERECH and INERECH1 if $get(YFORM)="INERCH" set NK = 2 if $get(YFORM)="INERCH1" set NK = 2 ;;30,7,2004;TYBD;26189
; FIXME : May be inadequate for certain currencies - e.g. Vietnam <GRF> if $length($piece(NETTO,".",1))>9 set NETTO = 0 set NETTO = $justify(NETTO,0,NK) quit NETTO
